Name: zinc oxide production | zinc oxide | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/20:Manufacture of chemicals and chemical products/201:Manufacture of basic chemicals, fertilizers and nitrogen compounds, plastics/2011:Manufacture of basic chemicals
Description: Zinc oxide is mainly produced from residues and secondary zinc by means of the indirect (or French) way. The demand for chemical purity imposed by the users means that a number of purification techniques are required. About 1 – 2 % of zinc oxide is produced by the wet process, 10 – 20 % by the direct process, and the remainder by the indirect process.;References:;Hischier R., Classen M., Lehmann M. and Scharnhorst W. (2007) Life cycle inventories of Electric and Electronic Equipment: Production, Use and Disposal. ecoinvent report No. 18.
